root.title: taiwan reject textil maker exchang rate plea
root.body: central bank governor chang chi-cheng reject request textil maker halt rise taiwan dollar u. dollar stop lose order south korea hong kong singapor spokesman taiwan textil feder say quot chang tell repres 19 textil associ last saturday govern could fix taiwan dollar exchang rate 35 one u. dollar due u. pressur appreci local currenc feder ask govern februari 19 hold exchang rate level feder say request mani local textil export oper without profit would go busi rate continu fall
